6. 用任意编程语言计算以下公式： [![img](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

* ```python
  import math
  
  outcome = sum([pow(n, 3) - pow(n, 1 / 3) for n in (1, 101)])
  print(outcome)
  ```
